title: Airborne Threat Assessment
description: An operator must assess multiple inbound, unidentified aircraft to determine their threat level and recommend an appropriate response.

tasks.description: Fuse radar, IFF (Identify Friend or Foe), and intelligence data for all inbound tracks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly correlates data from multiple sources for each track.

tasks.description: Compare track behavior (speed, altitude, vector) against known adversary tactics and flight plans.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly flags one track as anomalous and potentially hostile.

tasks.description: Prioritize the anomalous track and recommend scrambling interceptor aircraft for visual identification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator makes a timely and correct recommendation in line with standard procedures.
